html: Numerous storms are expected starting this afternoon, with heavy rain that could cause localized street flooding. Neutral ground & sidewalk parking restrictions are suspended from 12pm today until 10am Friday. Be cautious & move vehicles to higher ground. Stay weather alert!

Numerous storms are expected starting this afternoon, with heavy rain that could cause localized street flooding. 

 Neutral ground & sidewalk parking restrictions are suspended from 12pm today until 10am Friday.  Be cautious & move vehicles to higher ground. Stay weather alert!

That’s the reality for countless federal employees right now.
